summary: Changes all levels of Nightingale armour set to matching enchantments, also changes the enchantments to make the set more viable when compared to crafting avatars.
descriptionHtml:
[b]Short Description:[/b]

Changes all levels of Nightingale armour set to matching enchantments, also changes the enchantments to make the set more viable when compared to crafting avatars.


[b]Long Description:[/b]

Changes the Nightingale armour sets base levelled enchantments as follows:


[b]Vanilla set defaults:[/b]

Armour

lvl01 - Increases stamina by 20 points. Increases Frost Resistance by 15%.
lvl19 - Increases stamina by 30 points. Increases Frost Resistance by 30%.
lvl32 - Increases stamina by 40 points. Increases Frost Resistance by 50%.

Boots

lvl01 - Wearer is muffled and moves silently. (0.25 points)
lvl19 - Wearer is muffled and moves silently. (0.5 points)
lvl32 - Wearer is muffled and moves silently. (35 points)

Gloves

lvl01 - Lockpicking is 15% easier. One-handed attacks do 15% more damage.
lvl19 - Lockpicking is 20% easier. One-handed attacks do 20% more damage.
lvl32 - Lockpicking is 25% easier. One-handed attacks do 25% more damage.

Hood

lvl01 - Illusion spells cost 12% less to cast.
lvl19 - Illusion spells cost 15% less to cast.
lvl32 - Illusion spells cost 17% less to cast.


[b]Modification set changes:[/b]

Armour

All levels - Increases Fire, Frost & Shock Resistance by 30%.

Boots

All levels - Sneaking 35% more effective & Wearer moves silently. (35 points)

Gloves

All levels - One-handed & Marksman attacks do 20% more damage.

Hood

All levels - Conjuration & Illusion spell schools cost 15% less to cast.


[b]Version History / Changelog:[/b]

v1.0 - Initial public upload and release.


[b]FAQ / Postscript Q&A:[/b]

Q1: Is this cheating?
A1: Probably, if you don\'t like it why on earth would you choose to use it?

Q2: Will this change my bikini/thong/massively oversized breasts mod amour models?
A2: No, this changes the enchantments for the various levels of the player awarded Nightingale set, nothing else.
